subject: Football
Threats and Threatening Messages
Youth
Athletics and Sports
Children and Childhood
lead_paragraph: A discovery of four bullets in a youth football parking lot, each bearing a league official’s name, has led to canceled games and soul-searching in Norvelt, Pa.
snippet: A discovery of four bullets in a youth football parking lot, each bearing a league official’s name, has led to canceled games and soul-searching in Norvelt, Pa.
